v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0)) * 100 / DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderOfThe, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Entity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.TransactionType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate AS ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKinds, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus AS StatusOfOrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNo, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DateOfIncomingDocument, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS ForPayment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.GoodsOrder AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FactOfPaymentOrders AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment

v8:item.v8:content: Amount of the payment made by order, in the contract currency
Сумма произведенной оплаты по заказу, в валюте договора
Suma achitării efectuate conform comenzii în valuta contractului

Settings.QueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus <> VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) THEN CASE WHEN RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN ISNULL(RunSchedule.Completed, 0) = 0 AND ISNULL(TimeSchedulePlan.Completed, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN CASE WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END END ELSE 2 END AS ShipmentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted THEN CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <> 0) AND ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) = 0 THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 6 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 4 ELSE 2 END ELSE 2 END WHEN ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) <= ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) THEN CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN 2 ELSE 0 END ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN 5 WHEN PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN 3 ELSE 1 END ELSE 1 END END ELSE 2 END AS PaymentPictureNumber, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount > 0 THEN CAST((ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0)) * 100 / DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount AS NUMBER(15, 2)) ELSE 0 END AS PaymentPercentage, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS PastPerformance, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period < &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OverduePayment, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT RunSchedule.GoodsOrder IS NULL AND RunSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) AND NOT PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment IS NULL AND PaymentSchedule.Period = &CurrentDateSession THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS ForToday, CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed AND DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS OrderOfThe, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DeletionMark, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Number, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Date, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Posted, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Entity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.TransactionType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Counterparty.ContactPerson AS ContactPerson, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Contract, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ReceiptDate AS ReceiptDate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentCurrency, DocumentPurchaseOrder.AmountIncludesVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncludeVATInCost, DocumentPurchaseOrder.ExchangeRate, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Multiplicity, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnitReserve, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CustomerOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DocumentAmount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CounterpartyPriceKinds, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Event, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Responsible, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BaseUnit, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Comment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.SchedulePayment, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PettyCash, DocumentPurchaseOrder.BankAccount, DocumentPurchaseOrder.CashType, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder, DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus AS StatusOfOrderState, CASE WHEN (DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Open) OR DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.InProcess)) AND NOT DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed THEN "In process" ELSE CASE WHEN DocumentPurchaseOrder.StatusOfOrder.OrderStatus = VALUE(Enum.OrderStatuses.Completed) THEN "Completed" ELSE "Cancelled" END END AS OrderStatus, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Closed, DocumentPurchaseOrder.IncomingDocumentNo, DocumentPurchaseOrder.DateOfIncomingDocument, DocumentPurchaseOrder.Author, DocumentPurchaseOrder.PointInTime, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.Amount, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) - ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS ForPayment, ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfPayment, 0) + ISNULL(PaymentEvent.AmountOfAdvance, 0) AS AmountOfPaymentTurnover, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentAmountWithoutVAT, DocumentPurchaseOrder.hiDocumentVATAmount FROM Document.PurchaseOrder AS DocumentPurchaseOrder LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS RunSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = RunSchedule.GoodsOrder AND (RunSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersExecutionSchedule AS TimeSchedulePlan ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = TimeSchedulePlan.GoodsOrder AND (TimeSchedulePlan.Period > &CurrentDateSession) {LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.OrdersPaymentSchedule AS PaymentSchedule ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentSchedule.InvoiceForPayment AND (PaymentSchedule.Period <= &CurrentDateSession)} LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.FactOfPaymentOrders AS PaymentEvent ON DocumentPurchaseOrder.Ref = PaymentEvent.InvoiceForPayment
